content: I am curious if anyone has used the json schemas on XMLSpy with any success ( they support json schema validation in ver 2016+) I get a"allOf': Expected 2 schemas to match, but only 1 did match." or something similar when I try using the fhir schemas. Not much experience using them so I don't know if they should work out of the box like the xsds do or if an issue with the tool.
can reasonably expect it to be my generated schemas
